chara.textHome: Teehee! Yes! It's perfect!
This will do nicely for the next event...
Gah! What's your problem?!

Coming into someone's castle,
eavesdropping on their ramblings?!
And what's that look for?! So rude!

I happen to be the club leader,
Hinano Miyako.

Huh? The Chemistry Club!
This is our lab.
Climb over it! Blow it away!

There's always, always a way to clear
any hurdle, no matter how high.

Only the ones who put their backs
into it get to see the view from the top.

With chemistry and humanity...
the sky's the limit!
A bright future is waiting!
Uh, does this mean...

I can be one of those sexy scientists
in a white lab coat now?!

Me questioning myself will
only make everyone worry.

So, I've always got to be
the cool-headed veteran.

Of course I want to go big!
To be the great Hinano!

But it's not because
I want respect and admiration.

I want to be the one my juniors
can come to with anything, the "big"
veteran who sees them through it.
You're late! What were you doing?!
We can't keep the audience waiting!

As soon as you're ready,
hurry and set everything up!
Good morning.
What a crisp morning!
Perfect conditions for an experiment!
Don't you agree?
I'm hungry...
Starving isn't going to help me grow taller.
I wonder if I could make ramen in...
...a beaker?
Yeah, the Castle is definitly the best!
This place, right here, the science room.

I call it the Castle...and I call
the library the Villa!

Oh no! I was busy thinking about what to 
do for the next event, and now it's so late!

I need to go to bed...
Sleeping helps you grow taller!

Some day it will be possible to get taller
using chemistry, not physics!

One day, chemistry will progress
to that point!
Huh? You ready yet?
Why're you always messing around?

If you don't hurry up, the sun's gonna 
set before we even get going.
Seems like you wanna fight us, huh?
I'm 99% sure my hypothesis is correct!

All right, time to do an experiment and 
prove my hypothesis!
I used to do a lot of crazy experiments.

In fact...the very reason why I
became a Magical Girl is because
I was doing some dangerous stuff.
Flasks, test tubes, petri dishes...
Isn't glass just amazing?

I could easily talk for five hours about 
glass's incredible properties!
Didn't I tell you?!

Don't look down on me! That sort of
arrogance really pisses me off!
I prefer to write my reports out by hand.

It allows me to draw accurate diagrams,
an important skill every scientist
should have.

In chemistry, interesting things
are often dangerous as well.
You always have to be really careful.

A little carelessness can lead to 
something terrible happening.
I don't mind dealing with younger students,

but I could never deal with
another student like Emiri.
She's energetic enough on her own.
I thought I'd never grow...

But now that I think of it, I've grown 
strong enough to protect my classmates.

I like to gather my information
without using any digital sources.

I mean, it's true, I'm not good
at using computers

But having books that you love is way
more convenient than using a computer.
Emiri is...

I wouldn't say she's dangerous,
but you never know what she might do.
You definitely can't leave her alone.
Time to put my hypothesis to the test!
Yep, I'm satisfied!
This proves my hypothesis!
This is going to make for a great article!
The experiment was a huge success!
The name is Hinano Miyako.

I may not look it... Meh, whatever!
I'm a veteran Magical Girl, as you can see.
You can call me Hinano-senpai if you like?

N-not bad! I kind of feel like
I've grown a bit taller, too!

Results are so much sweeter when
they're the fruits of your honest work.
And if I apply that principle!

...Hehe.
I'm about to come up with a new idea!
I won't let anyone say I haven't grown!

I've gotta get even bigger to keep
my dear friends out of harm's way.

Yes, you'll never find a successful
person throughout history
who never put in the effort.

If I've got even a 1% chance of success,
I'd happily work my tail off to make it happen.
